macro-marker.settings.dimInactive.name: Inactive macro brightness
macro-marker.settings.dimInactive.hint: Makes inactive macros on the hotbar less bright. Set to 100 to disable the effect.
macro-marker.settings.defaultColour.name: Default colour
macro-marker.settings.defaultColour.hint: The default colour for active macros. Must be a valid CSS colour (e.g. hex, rgba or named).
macro-marker.settings.borderWidth.name: Border width
macro-marker.settings.borderWidth.hint: The width for the active macro border.
macro-marker.settings.animationSpeed.hin: The number of second it takes to complete a single animation. Use 0 to turn off animations.
